channel.title: HELP ME!(ill rep++)
channel.description:
well i need help with port forwading ive tried www.portforward.com's guides and they dont wont for me heres some pictures of the process (also can someone help me portforward!?) also the pictures are in uppit sorry :(? step 1 the first port forwading screen:
[url=http://s1.uppit.com/d/9901WX]http://s1.uppit.com/d/9901WX [/url]
thats the first loading screen
the port forwading choices i have
[url=http://s1.uppit.com/d/40RJLD]http://s1.uppit.com/d/40RJLD [/url]
the second selection of choices are
[code]http://s1.uppit.com/d/7LSA15 [/code] '
THANX if you help or atleast try rep++ will be given

item.title: HELP ME!(ill rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Ben_Sprinkle Ben Sprinkle
item.description:
@Ben_Sprinkle wrote:

that’s only if a person is dumb enough to share folders, otherwise it’s impossible (unless they have some kind of remote program or trojan running)

Read full topic

item.title: HELP ME!(ill rep++)
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

But hamachi is harmful, people can access the files on your PC, And you better not be using Ham for RST

Read full topic

item.title: HELP ME!(ill rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Ben_Sprinkle Ben Sprinkle
item.description:
@Ben_Sprinkle wrote:

hi zez1ma boy,
depends on your router also, usually there is a spot in your router ( http://192.168.15.1 or http://192.168.1.1 ) that you can add ports to be forwarded, otherwise you can use hamachi which is basically LAN over the internet so ports are auto forwarded

for more info visit http://hamachi.cc

Read full topic
